text: What are the treatments for Myhre syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Myhre syndrome:  - Centers for Disease Control and Prevention: Types of Hearing Loss  - Genetic Testing Registry: Myhre syndrome  - National Institute on Deafness and Other Communication Disorders: Communication Considerations for Parents of Deaf and Hard-of-Hearing Children   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Di
